statement.name: final
statement.parts: /* サイズコードMST取得 */ SELECT M1.SIZE_CD ,M1.SIZE_SEISIKI_NM ,M1.SIZE_SEISIKI_NMK ,M1.SIZE_RYAKU_NM ,M1.SIZE_NM ,M1.ADD_YMD ,M1.ADD_TM ,M1.ADDTAN_CD ,M1.UPD_YMD ,M1.UPD_TM ,M1.UPD_TANCD ,M1.SAKUJYO_YMD ,M1.SAKUJYO_FLG ,M1.JYUSIN_YMD ,M1.JYUSIN_TM FROM MDMT0090 M1 WHERE M1.SIZE_CD =
